generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Martel+Sans:wght@200;300&display=swap");*,:after,:before{box-sizing:border-box}blockquote,body,dd,dl,figure,h1,h2,h3,h4,p{margin:0}ol[role=list],ul[role=list]{list-style:none}html:focus-within{scroll-behavior:smooth}body{min-height:100vh;text-rendering:optimizeSpeed;line-height:1.5}a:not([class]){text-decoration-skip-ink:auto}img,picture{max-width:100%;display:block}button,input,select,textarea{font:inherit}@media (prefers-reduced-motion:reduce){html:focus-within{scroll-behavior:auto}*,:after,:before{animation-duration:.01ms!important;animation-iteration-count:1!important;transition-duration:.01ms!important;scroll-behavior:auto!important}}:root{--bg-clr:#d9dad8;--accent-clr:#b4ffc9;--font-clr:#cdb4ff;--body-fnt:"Helvetica";--title-fnt:"Martel Sans",sans-serif}body{background-color:var(--bg-clr);width:auto;height:100vh}header{margin:0;position:fixed;background-color:var(--bg-clr);border:2px solid #000;z-index:3;top:0;box-sizing:border-box}header,nav{width:100%;display:flex}nav{flex-flow:row nowrap;height:75px;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.logo{font-size:2rem;height:100%;margin:0;padding:15px 10px 0;font-family:var(--title-fnt);border-right:2px solid #000}@media screen and (max-width:1200px){.logo{border:none;padding:10px 0 0;align-items:center}}.nav-links{width:100%;height:100%;display:flex;flex-flow:row nowrap;justify-content:space-evenly;align-items:center}.nav-links a{text-decoration:none;color:#000;text-transform:uppercase;font-family:var(--body-fnt);border-right:2px solid #000;text-align:center;width:100%;height:100%;padding-top:25px;transition-property:background-color;transition:.5s ease-in-out}.nav-links a:hover{background-color:var(--accent-clr)}@media screen and (min-width:1200px){.hamburger-btn{display:none}}.ham-bottom,.ham-middle,.ham-top{width:15px;height:2px;background-color:#000;position:absolute;right:3px;top:4px;transform:rotate(0deg)}.open{transform:translateY(0) rotate(90deg)}.open .ham-top{transform:translateY(5px) translate(5px) rotate(45deg)}.opem .ham-middle{display:none}.open .ham-bottom{transform:translateY(5px) tralsate(5px);transform:rotate(-45deg)}.ham-middle{transform:translateY(5px)}.ham-bottom{transform:translateY(10px)}.mobile-menu{display:none;width:50%;left:50%;margin-top:50px}.menu-links,.mobile-menu{flex-flow:column nowrap;height:100vh}.menu-links{display:flex;background-color:var(--accent-clr);padding-top:50%;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.menu-links a{font-size:2rem;text-decoration:none;font-family:var(--title-fnt);border:2px solid .hero-info-content h2{font-size:2.5rem}.hero_main .hero-info .hero-btn{display:flex;margin-top:40%;background-color:var(--font-clr);height:100px;font-size:3rem;font-family:var(--body-fnt);text-transform:uppercase;cursor:pointer;box-sizing:border-box;border:2px solid #000;border-right:none;border-left:none;align-items:center;justify-content:center;text-align:center;transition:all .3s ease-in-out;text-decoration:none;color:#000}.hero_main .hero-info .hero-btn #hero-btn-icon{background-color:var(--font-clr);transition:all .7s ease-in-out;transform:rotate(0deg);margin-left:15px;margin-bottom:3px;padding:0}.hero_main .hero-info .hero-btn:hover{border:5px h3{font-size:4rem;font-family:var(--body-fnt);padding:15px}.about_box-items{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;grid-template-rows:1fr 1fr;height:100%;width:100%;margin:0 auto}.about_box-items .about_box-item{border-top:2px solid #000}.about_box-items .about_box-item .item-title{font-size:2rem;padding:15px;font-family:var(--body-fnt)}.about_box-items .about_box-item ease-in;width:80%;opacity:0;transform:translateY(-200px)}#box_button{display:flex;width:150px;height:50px;border-radius:100vw;justify-content:center;text-align:center;align-items:center;border:2px solid #000;text-decoration:none;color:#000;background-color:var(--accent-clr);font-family:var(--body-fnt);transition:all .3s linear}#box_button:hover{background-color:#cdb4ff;box-shadow:7px 4px 0 2px .box_button-title{visibility:hidden;opacity:0;transform:translateY(-200px)}.box_button1,.box_button4,.box_button9{z-index:2;margin-top:40px;margin-right:20px}.box_button3,.box_button7{z-index:4;margin-top:25px;margin-right:30px}.box_button2,.box_button6{z-index:4;margin-top:60px;margin-right:50px}.box_button8{z-index:4;margin-top:75px;margin-right:50px}
